Class FileUtils

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceAsTMPFile

        public static java.io.File getResourceAsTMPFile(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                                java.lang.String resource)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Get a resource as a temp files. This function copy a resource in a temp file to use it if it's not directly available in file system.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class which own this resource, this could be null.
        resource - The resource to find in the classpath
        Returns:
        The File which represent the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Generaly means an error occurs to get or copy the resource.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The resource is not in the classpath

      • copyStreams

        public static void copyStreams(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                               java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Copy stream into another. Read fully the input stream to write in output stream
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input to read
        outputStream - The output to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error while copying streams. See error for more details.
